001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidArgumentFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.UriFunctionException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
025
026public final class FnResolveUri {
027  @NonNull
028  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
029      .name("resolve-uri")
030      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
031      .deterministic()
032      .contextDependent()
033      .focusIndependent()
034      .argument(IArgument.builder()
035          .name("relative")
036          .type(IStringItem.class)
037          .zeroOrOne()
038          .build())
039      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
040      .returnZeroOrOne()
041      .functionHandler(FnResolveUri::executeOneArg)
042      .build();
043
044  @NonNull
045  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
046      .name("resolve-uri")
047      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
048      .deterministic()
049      .contextIndependent()
050      .focusIndependent()
051      .argument(IArgument.builder()
052          .name("relative")
053          .type(IStringItem.class)
054          .zeroOrOne()
055          .build())
056      .argument(IArgument.builder()
057          .name("base")
058          .type(IStringItem.class)
059          .one()
060          .build())
061      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
062      .returnZeroOrOne()
063      .functionHandler(FnResolveUri::executeTwoArg)
064      .build();
065
066  private FnResolveUri() {
067    // disable construction
068  }
069
070  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
071  @NonNull
072  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> executeOneArg(
073      @NonNull IFunction function,
074      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
075      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
076      IItem focus) {
077
078    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> relativeSequence
079        = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
080    if (relativeSequence.isEmpty()) {
081      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
082    }
083
084    IStringItem relativeString = relativeSequence.getFirstItem(true);
085    IAnyUriItem resolvedUri = null;
086    if (relativeString != null) {
087      resolvedUri = fnResolveUri(relativeString, null, dynamicContext);
088    }
089    return ISequence.of(resolvedUri);
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Implements the two argument version of the XPath 3.1 function <a href=
094   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-resolve-uri">resolve-uri</a>.
095   *
096   * @param function
097   *          the function definition
098   * @param arguments
099   *          a list of sequence arguments with an expected size of 2
100   * @param dynamicContext
101   *          the evaluation context
102   * @param focus
103   *          the current focus item
104   * @return a sequence containing the resolved URI or and empty sequence if
105   *         either the base or relative URI is {@code null}
106   */
107  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UnusedPrivateMethod") // used in lambda
108  @NonNull
109  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> executeTwoArg(
110      @NonNull IFunction function, // NOPMD - ok
111      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
112      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext, // NOPMD - ok
113      IItem focus) { // NOPMD - ok
114
115    /* there will always be two arguments */
116    assert arguments.size() == 2;
117
118    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> relativeSequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
119        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
120    if (relativeSequence.isEmpty()) {
121      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
122    }
123
124    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> baseSequence = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
125    IStringItem baseString = baseSequence.getFirstItem(true);
126
127    if (baseString == null) {
128      throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
129          InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TO_RESOLVE_URI,
130          "Invalid argument to fn:resolve-uri().");
131    }
132    IAnyUriItem baseUri = IAnyUriItem.cast(baseString);
133
134    IStringItem relativeString = relativeSequence.getFirstItem(true);
135
136    IAnyUriItem resolvedUri = null;
137    if (relativeString != null) {
138      resolvedUri = fnResolveUri(relativeString, baseUri, dynamicContext);
139    }
140    return ISequence.of(resolvedUri);
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * Resolve the {@code relative} URI against the provided {@code base} URI.
145   *
146   * @param relative
147   *          the relative URI to resolve
148   * @param base
149   *          the base URI to resolve against
150   * @param dynamicContext
151   *          the evaluation context used to get the static base URI if needed
152   * @return the resolved URI or {@code null} if the {@code relative} URI in
153   *         {@code null}
154   */
155  @Nullable
156  public static IAnyUriItem fnResolveUri(
157      @NonNull IStringItem relative,
158      @Nullable IAnyUriItem base,
159      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
160    return fnResolveUri(IAnyUriItem.cast(relative), base, dynamicContext);
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * Resolve the {@code relative} URI against the provided {@code base} URI.
165   *
166   * @param relative
167   *          the relative URI to resolve
168   * @param base
169   *          the base URI to resolve against
170   * @param dynamicContext
171   *          the evaluation context used to get the static base URI if needed
172   * @return the resolved URI or {@code null} if the {@code relative} URI in
173   *         {@code null}
174   */
175  @NonNull
176  public static IAnyUriItem fnResolveUri(
177      @NonNull IAnyUriItem relative,
178      @Nullable IAnyUriItem base,
179      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
180
181    IAnyUriItem baseUri = base;
182    if (baseUri == null) {
183      baseUri = FnStaticBaseUri.fnStaticBaseUri(dynamicContext);
184      if (baseUri == null) {
185        throw new UriFunctionException(UriFunctionException.BASE_URI_NOT_DEFINED_IN_STATIC_CONTEXT,
186            "The base-uri is not defined in the static context");
187      }
188    }
189
190    return baseUri.resolve(relative);
191  }
192}
